attributes.action: Keep gyms open during any COVID-19 restrictions
attributes.additional_details: Exercise is a crucial and essential part of everyone’s life. Gyms also provide a place to go to relieve anger, stress or take your mind off things. With constant cleaning and easily maintained socially distancing and a maximum capacity I believe they should stay open during any tier/lockdown. Especially during a time of year when outside is very cold and it is harder for people to go outside and exercise.
attributes.background: I believe all gyms across the country are in a  position where they can be COVID secure therefore , gyms should stay open as they are essential to a lot of people’s every day lives
